DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical trial compare pharmacokinetic characteristic GL2907 XL 20mg tablet Oxycontin CR 10mg tablet .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Open-label , Multiple-dose , Two-sequence , Two-period Crossover Study Investigate The Pharmacokinetics Between GL2907 Oxycontin CR Tab . 10mg Healthy Male Volunteers

DOC.criteria: 20~45 year old , Healthy Adult Male Subject Body Weight ≥ 50kg Ideal Body Weight ≤ ±20 % ALT AST > 1.25 time ( Upper Normal Range ) Total Bilirubin > 1.5 time ( Upper Normal Range ) CPK > 2 time ( Upper Normal Range ) BUN Creatinine > Normal Range Systolic BP > 160mmHg < 80mmHg , Diastolic BP > 100mmHg < 50mmHg
